summary: A cop chases international gangster Billa and happens to be the only one to see him die. He places Velu, Billa's lookalike, inside the gang to get information. But Velu is framed for killing the cop.
cast: Ajith Kumar|Nayanthara|Rahman|Namitha|Prabhu|Yog Japee|Adithya Menon|Mark|Shana|Ricky|Premgi Amaren|Avneesh Parekh|Balasubramaniam|Hazel Keech|Santhanam
keywords: character name as title|one word title|bikini|dual role|remake
title: Billa
